snippet.title: DARIUSBURST SECOND PROLOGUE Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The DARIUS (SAGAIA) series made shooting game history with its unique atmosphere and sound design, and now the latest installment, DARIUSBURST SECOND PROLOGUE, has come to the iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch!!

Based on the critically acclaimed handheld console game DARIUSBURST, this smartphone edition boasts intuitive, responsive controls optimized especially for touchscreens.

This edition also includes a variety of smartphone-exclusive bonuses, including SP Mode (a "remixed" version of the game with new enemy patterns and revised boss battles), the Assault ship from the arcade DARIUSBURST, and new music by ZUNTATA!

DARIUSBURST SECOND PROLOGUE: a new battle awaits!

Now available on the App Store!
